title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_One_Piece__Heroines
transformers_text: One Piece Heroines is a Japanese light novel series written by Jun E saka and illustrated by S ayaka Suwa It began publication under Shueisha's Jump J Books imprint in June 2021 The series is a female centric spin off of the One Piece manga series by Eiichiro Oda An anime adaptation has been announced Written by Jun E saka and illustrated by S ayaka Suwa One Piece Heroines began publication under Shueisha's Jump J Books light novel imprint on June 4 2021 1 Two volumes have been released as of March 4 2024 2 In May 2024 Viz Media announced that they had licensed the series and would release the first volume in Q 2 2025 3 An anime adaptation was announced during the One Piece Day event and live stream on August 10 2025 It is directed by Haruka Kamata ni with Momo ka Toyoda writing the script and Takashi Kojima designing the characters 7 8
